entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 10:53 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

Temperature: 0.2°C

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of drizzle with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast early this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:11 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries and periods of freezing drizzle. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:11 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023
